messages.content: Yes, the NSF Emerging Frontiers grant does support equipment purchases. The maximum amount you can request for equipment is **$100,000**. The total award can be up to **$500,000**, and the application deadline is **March 1, 2025**. You can start your application here: https://www.nsf.gov/apply/.
